en.description: Graduating in May 2025 with a B.S. in Computer Information Systems from the University of Houston’s Cullen College of Engineering, I graduated cum laude. I hold the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner certification. I combine technical expertise with creativity to design scalable, secure, and impactful solutions that solve real-world problems.

Over the last 4 years, I’ve built projects across web development, cloud architecture, database management, and application development. I’ve optimized appointment systems for a local business, automated marketing funnels, and digitized paper records.
If you’re looking for someone who can confidently debug both code—and clearly communicate with stakeholders—I’d love to connect. Feel free to reach out at trinitylklein@outlook.com.
